subSections.title: Alternative forms
subSections.text:
* {{l|mul|艹}} {{qualifier|when used as a head Chinese radical}}
* {{l|mul|䒑}} {{qualifier|non-classical form}}

subSections.title: Usage notes
subSections.text: * In the {{w|Kangxi Dictionary}} there are 1,902 characters (out of 40,000) that use this radical, making this the most commonly used radical.
